# Recipe: Oven Roasted Sweet Potatoes

## Introduction
Oven roasted sweet potatoes are a delicious and nutritious side dish that can be enjoyed with various meals. Sweet potatoes are packed with vitamins, minerals, and fiber, making them a healthy addition to your diet. This recipe brings out the natural sweetness of the potatoes and enhances their flavor with a hint of spices.

## Ingredients
- 2 large sweet potatoes
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 teaspoon paprika
- 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1/4 teaspoon black pepper

## Equipment
- Baking sheet
- Knife
- Mixing bowl
- Spatula

## Preparation Time
- 10 minutes

## Cooking Time
- 30 minutes

## Steps
1. Preheat the oven to 425째F (220째C).
2. Wash the sweet potatoes thoroughly and pat them dry with a paper towel.
3. Cut the sweet potatoes into 1-inch cubes or wedges.
4. In a mixing bowl, combine the olive oil, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper. Stir well to create a spice mixture.
5. Add the sweet potato cubes to the bowl and toss them with the spice mixture until evenly coated.
6. Arrange the coated sweet potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet.
7. Place the baking sheet in the preheated oven and roast for 25-30 minutes, or until the sweet potatoes are tender and golden brown. Flip the sweet potatoes halfway through cooking for even browning.
8. Remove from the oven and let the sweet potatoes cool for a few minutes before serving.

## Serving Suggestions
- Oven roasted sweet potatoes can be served as a side dish with grilled chicken, roasted turkey, or baked salmon.
- They also make a great addition to salads or grain bowls for a nutritious and filling meal.
- Serve them with a dollop of sour cream or Greek yogurt for added creaminess.

## Variations
- For a sweeter twist, drizzle maple syrup over the sweet potatoes before roasting.
- Add a kick of heat by sprinkling chili powder or cayenne pepper along with the other spices.
- Experiment with different herbs such as rosemary or thyme for a unique flavor profile.

## Tips and Tricks
- Make sure to cut the sweet potatoes into uniform sizes to ensure even cooking.
- Toss the sweet potatoes with the spice mixture in a mixing bowl to ensure they are evenly coated.
- For extra crispiness, place the baking sheet on the top rack of the oven during the last few minutes of cooking.
- If you prefer softer sweet potatoes, you can roast them for a few extra minutes.

## Nutritional Information
- Serving Size: 1 cup (200g)
- Calories: 180
- Total Fat: 7g
- Saturated Fat: 1g
- Sodium: 340mg

- Dietary Fiber: 4g

## Storage and Leftovers
- Store any leftover oven roasted sweet potatoes in an airtight container in the refrigerator.
- They can be stored for up to 3-4 days.
- To reheat, place them in a preheated oven at 350째F (175째C) for about 10 minutes or until warmed through.

## Frequently Asked Questions
- Can I use other types of potatoes for this recipe?
  - Yes, you can use regular potatoes or even a combination of sweet and regular potatoes.
- Can I make this recipe ahead of time?
  - Yes, you can prepare the sweet potatoes and toss them with the spice mixture ahead of time. Just cover and refrigerate until ready to roast.
- Can I freeze the roasted sweet potatoes?
  - While it's possible to freeze roasted sweet potatoes, their texture may change slightly upon thawing. It's best to enjoy them fresh for the best taste and texture.
